content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 4, "index": 34}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft stripped_spruce_wood, I need to place 4 stripped_spruce_log in the crafting table. I will start by moving the stripped_spruce_log from slot 34 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "spruce_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I will move another stripped_spruce_log to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 34}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Next I will move another stripped_spruce_log to slot 4.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 4 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 34}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Finally I will move the last stripped_spruce_log to slot 5.
Ok
act: move from slot 34 to slot 5 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: stripped_spruce_wood
inventory=[{"type": "stripped_spruce_wood", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 4}, {"type": "stripped_spruce_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 5}, {"type": "chicken_spawn_egg", "quantity": 20, "index": 16}, {"type": "dark_prismarine_stairs", "quantity": 7, "index": 24}, {"type": "piglin_brute_spawn_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 25}, {"type": "soul_sand", "quantity": 31, "index": 26}, {"type": "cod_spawn_egg", "quantity": 17, "index": 27}, {"type": "white_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 31}, {"type": "gunpowder", "quantity": 40, "index": 35}, {"type": "sugar_cane", "quantity": 6, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the stripped_spruce_wood by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3
